data.name: TcpChannelProvider_TcpListener_Failed
data.value: An error occurred while starting to listen incoming TCP connections

data.name: ServerPacketListener_FirstPacketMustBeConnect
data.value: The first packet sent by a Client must be a Connect. The connection will be closed.

data.name: ServerPacketListener_KeepAliveTimeExceeded
data.value: The keep alive tolerance of {0} seconds has been exceeded and no packet has been received from client {1}. The connection will be closed.

data.name: ServerPacketListener_NoConnectReceived
data.value: No connect packet has been received since the network connection was established. The connection will be closed.

data.name: ServerPacketListener_SecondConnectNotAllowed
data.value: Only one Connect packet is allowed. The connection will be closed.

data.name: SessionRepository_ClientSessionNotFound
data.value: No session has been found for client {0}

data.name: ConnectionProvider_ClientDisconnected
data.value: Server - The connection for client {0} is not connected. Removing connection

data.name: ConnectionProvider_ClientIdExists
data.value: An active connection already exists for client {0}. Disposing current connection and adding the new one

data.name: ConnectionProvider_RemovingClient
data.value: Server - Removing connection of client {0}

data.name: DisconnectFlow_Disconnecting
data.value: Server - Disconnecting client {0}

data.name: PacketChannelCompleted
data.value: Server - Packet Channel observable sequence has been completed for client {0}

data.name: ServerPacketListener_ConnectionError
data.value: Server - An error occurred while executing the connect flow. Client: {0}

data.name: ServerPacketListener_ConnectPacketReceived
data.value: Server - A connect packet has been received from client {0}

data.name: ServerPacketListener_DispatchingMessage
data.value: Server - Dispatching {0} message to flow {1} for client {2}

data.name: ServerPacketListener_DispatchingPublish
data.value: Server - Dispatching Publish message to flow {0} for client {1} and topic {2}

data.name: ServerPacketListener_DispatchingSubscribe
data.value: Server - Dispatching Subscribe message to flow {0} for client {1} and topics: {2}

data.name: ServerPacketListener_Error
data.value: Server - An error occurred while listening and dispatching packets - Client: {0}

data.name: ServerPublishReceiverFlow_SendingWill
data.value: Server - Sending last will message of client {0} to topic {1}

data.name: ServerPublishReceiverFlow_TopicNotSubscribed
data.value: The topic {0} has no subscribers, hence the message sent by {1} will not be forwarded

data.name: ServerSubscribeFlow_ErrorOnSubscription
data.value: Server - An error occurred when subscribing client {0} to topic {1}

data.name: ServerSubscribeFlow_InvalidTopicSubscription
data.value: Server - The topic {0}, sent by client {1} is invalid. Returning failure code

data.name: Server_CleanedOldSession
data.value: Server - Cleaned old session for client {0}

data.name: Server_CreatedSession
data.value: Server - Created new session for client {0}

data.name: Server_DeletedSessionOnDisconnect
data.value: Server - Removed session for client {0} as part of Disconnect flow

data.name: Server_NewSocketAccepted
data.value: Server - A new TCP channel has been accepted

data.name: Server_PacketsObservableCompleted
data.value: Server - Packet observable sequence has been completed, hence closing the channel

data.name: Server_PacketsObservableError
data.value: Server - Packet observable sequence had an error, hence closing the channel

data.name: Server_InitializeError
data.value: An error occurred while initializing the server

data.name: Mqtt_Disposing
data.value: Disposing {0}...

data.name: Server_NotStartedError
data.value: The Server has to be started first, in order to execute any operation

data.name: ConnectionProvider_PrivateClientAlreadyRegistered
data.value: A private client with Id {0} is already registered

data.name: ServerPublishReceiverFlow_SystemMessageNotAllowedForClient
data.value: Publish messages with a leading $ in the topic are considered server specific messages, hence remote clients are not allowed to publish them
